thread.title: Former Family Circle Cup champs sign on to play Volvo Open in 2016
thread.title_full: Former Family Circle Cup champs sign on to play Volvo Open in 2016

title: Former Family Circle Cup champs sign on to play Volvo Open in 2016
text:
Former Family Circle Cup champs sign on to play Volvo Open in 20 - WCIV-TV | ABC News 4 - Charleston News, Sports, Weather Member Center: Former Family Circle Cup champs sign on to play Volvo Open in 2016 Posted: Updated: 
CHARLESTON, S.C. (AP) - The past two Family Circle Cup champions in Angelique Kerber and Andrea Petkovic have committed to play in the rebranded Volvo Cars Open in 2016. 
Kerber and Petkovic join Venus Williams and Madison Keys in the clay-court field next April. 
Kerber outlasted Keys in last year's finals, 6-2, 4-6, 7-5. Petkovic took the title the year before at the Family Circle Tennis Center. 
Kerber is ranked ninth in the world and has won seven WTA titles, including four this season. 
Petkovic is ranked 20th in the world and has an 11-2 mark in her three years playing in Charleston. 
Eleanor Adams, Volvo Cars Open Tournament manager, said the event was excited to have the former champions return next spring. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. Most Popular
